choose.otherwise: select max(b.rank) from( select *, @curRank := @curRank + 1 as rank from board, (SELECT @curRank := 0) r where title like '%${keyword }%' and hit != -1 order by reg_date) b order by b.rank desc

choose.when: select a.no, a.title, b.name, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, b.password, a.user_no as userNo, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.g_no <= #{maxGroup } - 5 * (#{nowPage} - 1) and a.g_no >= (#{maxGroup } - 5 * (#{nowPage} - 1)) - 5 + 1 order by a.g_no desc, a.o_no
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, b.name, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, b.password, a.user_no as userNo, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth from( select *, @curRank := @curRank + 1 as rank from board, (SELECT @curRank := 0) r where title like '%${keyword }%' and hit != -1 order by reg_date) a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.rank <= #{maxGroup } - 5 * (#{nowPage} - 1) and a.rank >= (#{maxGroup } - 5 * (#{nowPage} -1)) -5 + 1 order by a.rank desc
